templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/size-chart

templates.name: Are the bracelets stretchy?
templates.content: Our bracelets do have some stretch to them, so the measurements can expand slightly.

templates.name: Do you offer financing?
templates.content: We do offer financing with Afterpay which allows you to spread out your payments over time. Simply head over to checkout to see if your order is eligible for that option.

templates.name: Can you ship to PO Boxes?
templates.content: We currently aren't able to ship to PO Boxes, but keep an eye out for more improvements there.

templates.name: Are your phone cases shock resistant?
templates.content: Our Phone Cases aren't shock resistant.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: What are your rings made of? / Will your rings turn my finger green?
templates.content: Our rings are made from stainless steel, so they won't turn your finger green.

templates.name: Just Looking Best Sellers
templates.content:
Sounds good. Here are our most popular products at the moment https://elevatedfaith.com/collections/best-sellers
Does anything catch your eye?

templates.name: Waterproof bracelets / rings
templates.content: While our rings and bracelets are water-resistant, we highly recommend avoiding prolonged exposure to water when possible.

templates.name: Prayer request
templates.content: Thank you for having the courage to reach out! We take your requests very seriously, and we are here for you. Please fill out the following form to complete your request: https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/prayer-request?utm_campaign=concierge-everywhere&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=86lka

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: It is our mission to help you share the Gospel in your communities! You can apply to become a brand ambassador here: https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/brand-ambassadors

templates.name: Do you sell through Amazon?
templates.content: We don't sell through Amazon at this time.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/return-policy

templates.name: To help with your decision
templates.content: To help with your decision today, check out our Bracelet Club subscription plan: https://elevatedfaith.com/products/bracelet-club

templates.name: Order Upsell
templates.content: By the way, I think these stickers would be a great addition to go with your order: https://elevatedfaith.com/collections/christian-stickers

templates.name: Sold Out Product Rec [INSERT LINK]
templates.content: Sorry that product is sold out at the moment. What do you think about this instead [link]?

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: All our packages are shipped from our warehouse in Winneconne, Wisconsin.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at hello@elevatedfaith.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: How can I view how many Faith Points I have?
templates.content: You can view your points by logging in to your account and going to this link - https://elevatedfaith.attn.tv/sl/_Xdbewvj

templates.name: Are your shirts screen printed?
templates.content: Our shirts are screen printed unless otherwise noted that they're printed with puff ink.

templates.name: When a customer texts in FAITH
templates.content: Welcome! Your 15% off coupon code is SMS15. Tap here to automatically apply it and shop now: https://elevatedfaith.attn.tv/sl/LVTfken9

templates.name: Ring size
templates.content: You can check out this page to help you figure out your ring size - https://elevatedfaith.attn.tv/sl/YLomeLve If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to let me know.

templates.name: Military discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: All of our bracelets & accessories have a 30-day warranty, which means we'll replace the damaged item within 30 days from the time of purchase. To get a replacement, go to returns.elevatedfaith.com and go through the return/exchange process.  Keep in mind, there are 3 exceptions; we can only issue a replacement if you provide a photo of the damaged item, if an item has been altered in any way, we can't replace it, and we're unable to replace lost or stolen items.

templates.name: What's the Cause/ Where do profits go
templates.content: Every item we sell is a conversation starter that has a unique meaning to help you grow in your faith. We give a portion of every order to Christian charities around the world.

templates.name: Are phone cases protective / durable?
templates.content: You don't have to worry about that as our cases are durable enough to protect your phone from drops and scratches!

templates.name: Will a handling fee apply if I choose to exchange my order?
templates.content: Exchanges for a different size or store credit don't incur any handling fees. This fee only applies if you want a refund to your original payment method.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to apply for wholesale is to go here: https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/wholesale?utm_campaign=concierge&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=kapRh

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/elevatedfaith/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/elevatedfaith

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size? You can also check out the size chart on the product page of the item you're interested in.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days, and we usually ship via UPS or USPS. Once shipped it will take 3-7 business days domestically and 14-40 business days internationally. We also offer 2 day shipping, if you need it sooner.

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $75. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://elevatedfaith.com/pages/rewards?utm_campaign=concierge&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=QW8kn

templates.name: Can I track my sticker order?
templates.content: We unfortunately do not receive tracking information for sticker orders as they are shipped in envelopes. If you do not receive your order within 2 weeks of placing it, please reach out to orders@elevatedfaith.com, and we will be here to help.

templates.name: Can I return or exchange my mystery item purchase?
templates.content: Due to the nature of our mystery items, they are final sale. If the mystery item you received is damaged or defective, feel free to reach out to our team at orders@elevatedfaith.com, and we'll be happy to help!

templates.name: When will I receive my refund?
templates.content: Your return will usually be processed within 1-2 weeks. Please allow up to 10 business days for refunds to be received once the return has been processed.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.elevatedfaith.com/#/

templates.name: Do you provide price adjustments?
templates.content: Unfortunately, as a small business, we are not able to maintain adjustments that many large corporate retailers put in place since our margins are now razor thin due to our product & shipping cost increases and inflation over the last year. We do however appreciate your understanding and support as we continue to support charities around the world in need through your purchase.

templates.name: Order Lookup/Tracking
templates.content:
For help tracking your order, please ensure you're signed into your Elevated Faith account and use this link:

https://elevatedfaith.com/#status-orders

Let me know if you have any questions!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://elevatedfaith.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email us at hello@elevatedfaith.com. Our team will be more than happy to look into this for you!
